alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:17PM CST until March 02 at 4:45PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN COLEMAN...NORTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH AND NORTHEASTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 417 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, or near Millersview, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Stacy around 425 PM CST. Voss around 430 PM CST. Gouldbusk around 435 PM CST. Waldrip around 440 PM CST. Rockwood around 445 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Fisk and Shields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
